mapper.select: SELECT round(SUM(bs.NAMT),4) NAMT FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bills bs LEFT JOIN ${com}.d_t_food_bill b ON bs.CBILL_C = b.CBILL_C WHERE b.cbranch_c = #{shopC} AND dbusiness >= #{startDate} AND dbusiness <= #{endDate} AND bs.cLitCls_C in('3033','3036') GROUP BY b.CBRANCH_C

SELECT im.ITEM_ID ITEM_ID, im.ITEM_NAME ITEM_NAME, im.ITEM_DIMENSION ITEM_DIMENSION, round(SUM(t.item_gross_count * d.nqty),4) AS nqty FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b, ${com}.d_t_food_bills d, ${com}.d_t2_therapy t, ${com}.d_t2_item_meta im WHERE d.CBILL_C = b.CBILL_C AND b.cbranch_c = #{shopC} AND t.THERAPY_ID = d.cfood_c AND t.item_id =trim(im.ITEM_ID) AND trim(im.CATEGORY_ID )= #{categoryId} AND b.dbusiness >= #{startDate} AND b.dbusiness <= #{endDate} GROUP BY im.ITEM_ID, im.ITEM_NAME, im.ITEM_DIMENSION ORDER BY im.ITEM_ID

SELECT m.item_id,
ROUND(g1.qty1*10000/#{amt1},4) nqty1, ROUND(g2.qty2*10000/#{amt2},4) nqty2, ROUND(g3.qty3*10000/#{amt3},4) nqty3 FROM (SELECT m.item_id FROM ${com}.d_t2_item_meta m WHERE ${query}) m LEFT JOIN (SELECT round(SUM(t.item_gross_count * d.nqty),4) qty1, t.item_id FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b, ${com}.d_t_food_bills d, ${com}.d_t2_therapy t WHERE d.CBILL_C = b.CBILL_C AND t.THERAPY_ID = trim(d.cfood_c) AND b.cbranch_c = #{shopC} AND b.dbusiness >= #{startDate1} AND b.dbusiness <= #{endDate1} GROUP BY t.item_id)g1 ON m.item_id = g1.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT round(SUM(t.item_gross_count * d.nqty),4) qty2, t.item_id FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b, ${com}.d_t_food_bills d, ${com}.d_t2_therapy t WHERE d.CBILL_C = b.CBILL_C AND t.THERAPY_ID = d.cfood_c AND b.cbranch_c = #{shopC} AND b.dbusiness >= #{startDate2} AND b.dbusiness <= #{endDate2} GROUP BY t.item_id)g2 ON m.item_id = g2.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT round(SUM(t.item_gross_count * d.nqty),4) qty3, t.item_id FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b, ${com}.d_t_food_bills d, ${com}.d_t2_therapy t WHERE d.CBILL_C = b.CBILL_C AND t.THERAPY_ID = d.cfood_c AND b.cbranch_c = #{shopC} AND b.dbusiness >= #{startDate3} AND b.dbusiness <= #{endDate3} GROUP BY t.item_id)g3 ON m.item_id = g3.item_id
